title: Home Page Load
description: Verify that the home page loads correctly and displays the main components.
steps: Check for the presence of the header.
Check for the presence of the 'Scan Receipt' button.
expectedResult: Home page loads with all key elements visible.

title: Camera Access
description: Verify that clicking the scan button triggers camera access.
steps: Check if the camera interface or permission prompt appears.
expectedResult: Camera interface opens or permission is requested.
